title: Activity-Based Training (ABT) for Strengthening Practical Mathematics Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Mathematical Concepts and Possession of Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining collaborative activities via real-time video tools with LMS-based self-directed learning

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world mathematical problems encountered in industrial settings using the ABT model.
Learners effectively communicate with peers and instructors by utilizing digital collaboration tools (video conferencing, digital whiteboards).
Learners complete at least 80% of self-directed learning materials provided through the LMS and achieve a score of 75% or higher on assessment tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
